text: Tanker spills, backwater contamination, Incandues waste, Atmospheric pollution.
Covid-19 pandemic impacts the ocean sustainability, including altered ecological systems and addressing ocean deoxygenization

the result of sewage disposal in oceans, which increases biological oxygen demand (BOD) and decreases dissolved oxygen demand (DO). It is also caused by the death of aquatic organisms, ship materials stuck inside the marine organisms, and dredged material that carries heavy metals. also cause the high BOD and COD values.
The high density of oil pollution is caused by the huge amount of waste that is discharged into the sea.
the death of aquatic organisms due to the introduction of garbage and other waste
Accidental spillages at sea cause marine pollution
